name: Achilleus
effect:
Elf • Paladin • Planar • Undead / Death Knight • Syneri
If Achilleus does not have a Weapon equipped, wounds inflicted with his melee strikes may not be reduced.
React: After target character is hit with a melee strike by Achilleus: Spend the target.

name: Aegis
effect: React: Before target character in this rank suffers wounds: Reduce the wounds by two. The target gains DEFEND +10 until end of turn.
"Otherworldly crows roost amongst the Storm's clouds. Faith alone keeps them there." - Niobe

name: Aida
effect:
Free Kingdoms
Characters adjacent to Aida gain +2 Skill.
While Aida is in your discard pile, your Free Kingdoms gain +3 Skill.
"Her ways are strange, this islander. But the conviction that burns in her eyes... Yes, I will follow her."

name: Aimonos
effect:
The Chosen • Planar • Unique • Daemon
Aimonos gains +2 ATK and Skill for each Charge he has.
React: After Aimonos enters play, kill up to five ready Thralls: Put an equal number of Charges on Aimonos.
Order: Once per turn, remove a Charge: Move forward one rank, perform a +10 ranged strike, or Aimonos inflicts an additional wound with melee strikes until end of turn.

name: Alert
effect: React: After this rogue is targeted with a strike: This rogue must succeed with a perception check (DC 20) to ready.
"Slow, Nothrog. Fatally slow. But your death at my Lady of Pain's hands will be slower still." - Freia

name: Alexa Genecourt
effect:
Deverenian • Paladin • DEFEND +5
React: After a strike or action targets an adjacent Stormwraith or non-fighter Deverenian: Succeed with a DEFEND check (DC 20) to cancel the strike or action.
"Death afrights the paladin not, cur. Canst thou claim the same?"

name: Altus' Cloak
effect:
Armor • STEALTH +3
This rogue gains +2 Skill for each character in this rank and +1 AC for each rank in your formation.
Altus was a thief before he was a Dragon Lord, but his old possessions lie scattered in his wake. Their potency has not been lost.

name: Amatria Tansiq
effect:
Elf • Assassin / Tansiq
React: Before target opposing character kills Amatria with a strike or action: The target must succeed with a poison check (DC 12) or suffer a wound.
"Be thankful the shadows mask her face." - The Lady of Pain

name: Angus Hammerfall
effect:
Free Kingdoms / Exile
Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike.
"Humans aren't so bad, I suppose. It's remembering your names that's difficult."

name: Anyah
effect:
Free Kingdoms
React: Before Anyah dies, target a Free Kingdoms in this rank: The target has an additional melee strike (base = target's primary ATK) the next time he attacks.
"You left Bradley behind!?"

name: Arc Lightning
effect:
Air
Spend Order: Target a character within three ranks: The target must succeed with a magic save (DC = target's AC) or suffer two wounds.
"Another reason why elves wear armor made of bone, not metal." - Kilis of Flesh

name: Arla Favorsight
effect:
Dwarf
Spend Order: Target a Dwarf: The target gains a bonus (or penalty) to his ATK equal to his AC - 10, until end of turn.
"Be as hard, as unyielding as the rock which sheltered us for so long, and then turn resilience itself into a weapon."

name: Artheon
effect:
Elf / Syneri
Spend Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike.
"Can you count to Ten, meddling human?"

name: Arve Yscar
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Lycanthrope • Paladin
Your non-Arve characters in this rank gain the feat(s) Arve Yscar has, but at +0.
Order: Once per turn: Until Arve uses this ability again, he gains your choice of RIPOSTE +5, DEFEND +5, or MAGIC RESISTANCE +0.

name: Ashreign
effect:
Mercenary • Unique • Dragon / Young Adult
May not equip items.
Order: Once per turn: Move forward or backward one rank.
Spend Order: Target a character within one rank: The target must succeed with four consecutive magic saves (DC 23) or suffer a wound for each failure.

name: Atiratu
effect:
The Chosen Warlord • Summoner
Order: Once per turn, kill any number of ready Thralls: Search your deck for a Daemon whose Level is equal to or lower than twice the combined Levels of the killed Thralls and put it in your hand.
"The price of defiance is death, Nothrog."

name: Atone
effect:
Dwarf
Spend React: After Atone enters play, target another Dwarf: Remove one wound from the target.
"He speaks not of his sins, but since his quest for absolution has continued these past ten yesrs, I for one am content not to know." - Chant

name: Aura of Protection
effect: React: After this cleric is targeted with an action that does not produce a strike: The action is canceled.
"We elves have no true gods to worship, only the predatory Elements that hunger for our essence. Appeasement fends them off for a time, but drives my kin to depravities of their own." - Yanthorine

name: Axe of Tergoth
effect:
Weapon
This fighter has an additional melee strike (base +2 ATK) when he attacks.
"Too big for you!" - Kul of Clan Tergoth

name: Babbling Mouther
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
May not equip items.

"You chatter, gibber, and babble, but those voices serve as a counterpoint to my own. They're most calming, and let those who cannot stand the cacophony serve as your repast! They come willingly to your lair when I speak of the treasure, the witless fools!" - Jigoral

name: Backstab
effect: React: Before this rogue makes a melee strike roll: If the target of the strike is spent, this rogue gains +5 ATK for this strike and the strike inflicts an additional wound.
"Too easy. No art to it." - The Lady of Pain

name: Balian's Helm
effect:
Helm
Adjacent characters gain +2 AC.
He was a priest of the blood moon Bascaron, and its mutilating madness seeps from all his relics.

name: Ball Lightning
effect:
Air
Order: Target a character within two ranks: The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 15) or suffer a wound.
"Embrace the Storm, worthless thrall." - Layamon

name: Ballista Crew
effect:
Nothrog • Siege
May not attack.
Spend Order: Stun the Ballista Crew: Perform a +3 ranged strike that inflicts an additional wound and ignores any AC bonus from Armor, Shield, or Helm items.
"A means to blood the enemy's charge. Works like a charm." - Kul of Clan Tergoth

name: Banish the Wound
effect: Spend React: Before target character suffers wounds: Reduce the wounds by one.
"Through all our struggles, Kor has been with us. What makes you think he would abandon us now? We must be careful not to rely upon gods too much." - Mentor

name: Barrett Yscar
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Lycanthrope
Barrett is both a fighter and a rogue.
Barrett enters play as if he were Level 4.
Order: Once per game: Until end of game, Barett gains +5 ATK and +1 HP, has an additional melee strike (base +0 ATK) when he attacks, and his items are considered blank.

name: Battle Plans
effect:
Tactics
Spend Order: This fighter must succeed with a perception check (DC 12) to move any number of characters you control forward or backward one rank, in any order you choose.
"An Deverenia is to survive, she must adapt to this new world." - Brymin

name: Bear's Soul
effect: Order: Perform a melee strike. You may shuffle Bear's Soul into your deck.
"This new totem rewards our slaughter, but always desires more. Suits me." - Krenthor Gouge

name: Besh-Kar
effect:
The Chosen • Thrall
React: Before Besh-Kar is killed with an action by a character you control: Target non-stunned character within two ranks must succeed with a magic save (DC 10) or become spent. Spent characters who fail become stunned instead.

name: Betwys
effect:
Elf • Unique
React: Once per turn, after a ready Undead you control is killed: Search your deck for a card with the same name, reveal it and put it into your hand.
"There are always more, willing or otherwise."

name: Black Sun Helm
effect:
Helm
This fighter gains +1 Level for equipping items.
"The greatest darkness falls right after the dawn." - Sir Magnus

name: Black Sun Knight
effect:
Deverenian • Paladin
Black Sun Knight gains +1 ATK and AC for each other evil Paladin in play.
"The knights of the Black Sun suffer no infidel to live. An it take a century, still shall we make this land pure and united."

name: Blacksand Trap
effect:
Trap
React: After target character targets a character in this rank with a melee strike, spend and stun Blacksand Trap: The target must succeed with a dexterity save (DC 15, DC 20 if this character is a Dwarf) or suffer a wound and become stunned.

name: Blackwind
effect:
Mercenary • Unique • Dragon / Wyrmling
May not equip items.
Order: Once per turn: Move forward or backward one rank.
Spend Order: Target all characters in an adjacent rank: Each target must succeed with a magic save (DC 14) or suffer one wound.

name: Blade and Chain
effect:
Weapon • Shield • RIPOSTE +5
Melee strikes against this rogue gain no ATK bonus from Weapons.
React: After this rogue performs a melee strike from the RIPOSTE feat that hit, target a Weapon equipped to the target of the strike: Destroy the Weapon.

name: Blasphemous Sign
effect: Adjacent characters gain +3 ATK.
"One man's basphemy is another man's canon." - Naram-Sin

name: Blessed Vestments
effect:
Armor
+1 HP
With no ready supply of athril to make more, what little ironcloth the dwarves retain is passed on to their priesthood, a token of that which has been lost.

name: Blessing of Swiftness
effect: Order: Target character has an additional melee strike (base = target's primary ATK) when he attacks, until end of turn.
"Not that even a zombie needs such a blessing to catch a dwarf, but still..." - Sileth Elestra

name: Blink
effect: React: After this wizard is targeted with a strike or action by another character: Succeed with a Skill check (DC 14) to move to a different rank and the strike or action is canceled.
"Next time, you act as decoy, Logan!" - Za'beth Candlebane

name: Bloodoak Staff
effect:
Weapon
This cleric gains the Druid trait.
React: Before this cleric suffers wounds, spend Bloodoak Staff, inflict the same number of wounds on other characters you control: Reduce this cleric's wounds to zero. You cannot inflict more wounds on one of your characters than his hit points.

name: Bloodthirsty
effect: React: After this fighter performs a melee strike that killed an opposing character: This fighter performs a melee strike with an ATK equal to the previous strike.
"The only way to bathe." - Hrunting

name: Blue Wyrm Helm
effect:
Helm • Unique
React: After target character targets this character with an action that does not produce a melee strike, spend Blue Wyrm Helm: Perform a +4 ranged strike against the target.

name: Bokos
effect:
Nothrog • Barbarian
Bokos may perform one fighter action card from your discard pile as if it were in your hand, once per turn. Remove the card from the game after the action resolves.

name: Bola
effect: Order: Spend Bola: Perform a +4 ranged strike that does not inflict wounds. If the strike hits, spend the target.
"Useful for bringing down those not worth an arrow, so that the bone fiends may feast." - Kaimir

name: Bone Fiend
effect:
Elf • Undead
At the end of each turn, kill an Elf you control or remove an Elf in your discard pile from the game.
Order: Kill another Undead: Bone Fiend gains +3 ATK until end of turn.

name: Bone Golem
effect:
Elf • Undead
React: Before Bone Golem suffers wounds, spend a Necromancer: Reduce the wounds by one.
"I couldn't find any owlbears." - Skyyrek

name: Bow of Farsight
effect:
Bow
Spend Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike that may target an additional rank away.
"It allows its owner to see for leagues, but doesn't grant any extraordinary skill at shooting. One still has to aim, but at least there's no danger if you miss." - Logan

name: Bracers of Deflection
effect:
Shield • MAGIC RESISTANCE +0
React: Once per turn, after this wizard is targeted with a strike: This wizard gains +2 AC until end of turn.
Wizards prefer to wear less cumbersome protective gear, the better to weave their enchantments.

name: Brawl
effect:
Dwarf • MEDICINE +0 • DEFEND +4
Brawl is a cleric and a fighter.
Brawl enters play as if he were Level 4.
React: Before Brawl is killed with a melee strike by target character: Perform a melee strike against the target.

name: Breastplate of Power
effect:
Armor • Unique
Other characters in this rank gain +2 ATK and AC.
"The armor itself has no power-that's its secret. But the confidence it inspires in my men allows them to realise the true potential within themselves." - King Alaric

name: Brine Fiend
effect: Mercenary • Monster
"Don't make any sudden moves, or we're all dead." - Angus Hammerfall

name: Britomar
effect:
The Chosen • Thrall
React: Before Britomar is killed with an action by a character you control: Britomar performs a melee strike.
"My last breath, given to violence. And then, oblivion."

name: Brogan
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Unique
Order: Spend a Free Kingdoms in this rank: Move Brogan forward one rank. If Brogan moves, he has an additional melee strike (base +1 ATK) when he attacks until end of turn.
"Gang way, coming through!"

name: Bruntor's Helm
effect:
Helm
+1 HP
"He was a great man, and now his kingdom consists solely of this helm. I do not gift it rashly, warrior." - Lork Halbrook, the Last Denskan

name: Brymin of the Marches
effect:
Deverenian Warlord
Adjacent lower Level Deverenians gain DEFEND +3.
React: Once per turn, after Brymin performs a melee strike that killed its target: Reveal the top 10 cards of your deck. You may put one revealed fighter action card into your hand. Shuffle the remaining cards into your deck.

name: Bull Rush
effect: Spend Order: Move this fighter forward one rank. If this fighter is now in your front rank and he is not stunned, he may perform an attack without spending. Barbarians gain +3 ATK for the duration of the attack.
"You were a fool to come here, elf." - Krenthor Gouge

name: Caleb the Shifter
effect:
Deverenian • Illusionist
Spend React: Once per turn, after target character targets a strike: The target must choose a different target for the strike, if possible.
"Lowly wizards do have their uses." - Sir Magnus

name: Call the Abyss
effect:
Summoners perform this action without spending.
Spend React: After this wizard moves into your front rank or enters play: Put this card into play as an evil Level 1 fighter with the Planar and Monster traits, +4 ATK, 1 AC, +2 Skill, and 1 HP.
"Of course, our daemons don't come from your 'Abyss', dwarf." - Atiratu

name: Call Verdatha
effect:
Paladins perform this action without spending.
Spend Order: Search your deck for a Steed this character can legally equip and equip it to this character.
"The Storm hath not forsaken us, and neither shall our dragon-steeds." - Sir Magnus

name: Camel
effect:
Steed
Order: Spend Camel: Move this character either forward one rank or to another position in this rank.
Order: Once per turn, spend Camel: Ready a non-stunned item of Level 5 or less equipped to this character.

name: Castus the Burning
effect:
Deverenian / Myerdeth
Castus inflicts an additional wound with Fire spells.
"These thralls have been bred to serve. They merely require worthier masters, and who better than we? Perhaps we should entertain this assassin's offer..."

name: Cause Serious Wounds
effect: Spend Order: Target a character in an adjacent rank: This cleric must succeed with a Skill check (DC 10 + the target's Skill) to inflict two wounds on the target.
"Sometimes the gods' gifts must be turned to other uses." - Kerebrus

name: Celestial Flame
effect:
Weapon
This character inflicts an additional wound whenever he hits with an odd melee strike roll.
Righteousness bound in solid form, burning with an uncertain fire.

name: Chain Lightning
effect:
Air
Spend Order: Perform a +7 ranged strike. If it kills, then this wizard may perform a +4 ranged strike against a character in a rank adjacent to the first target's rank. If the second strike kills, then this wizard may perform a +0 ranged strike against a character in a rank adjacent to the second target's rank. No rank can contain more than one target. These strikes inflict an additional wound.

name: Chained Claw
effect: Order: Spend Chained Claw, target an opposing character within three ranks: If this rogue is in the front rank, the target must succeed with a dexterity save (DC 8 + this rogue's Skill) or move forward one rank.
"Yes, try to free yourself-that makes it hurt more!" - The Lady of Pain

name: Chant
effect:
Dwarf • Cantor
Dwarves adjacent to Chant gain +2 AC.
"Silent determination is one thing, lads, but nothing frightens the enemy more than a line of soldiers willing to sing their own funeral dirge as they stare death in the face."

name: Chirurgery Kit
effect:
Unique • MEDICINE +5
Spend Order: Target a character in this rank: Succeed with a MEDICINE check (DC 20) to remove one wound from the target.
A crude science, but a welcome one.

name: Chosen
effect: Order: Target a character you control: Until end of turn, while performing a strike against a character of opposite alignment than this cleric, the target gains +4 ATK and the strike inflicts an additional wound.
"Apparently being Chosen can include vastly different concepts." - Kohn

name: Close Ranks
effect:
Tactics
React: Before a character you control in any rank in front of this fighter's rank is killed: Move this fighter forward one rank.
"Just like old times." - Guardian

name: Cloudracer
effect:
Steed
Order: Discard a card from your hand: Move forward or backward one rank.
Order: Spend Cloudracer: Move forward or backward one rank.
"She's been with me since the start. The nearest thing I have to family now." - Logan

name: Collapsing Bow
effect:
Bow
Order: Spend the Collapsing Bow: Perform a +2 ranged strike.
Order: Once per turn: If this rogue is a Scout, perform a +2 ranged strike.
"They fold down small enough that a typical gateguard won't notice it." - Yemat

name: Commit the Reserves
effect:
Tactics
Spend Order: Choose a Level higher than 1: Until end of turn, reduce the entering rank of your characters of the chosen Level by one.
"And after each battle, there are fewer to commit to the next." - Sir Robert

name: Corinth's Refuse
effect:
Elf • Undead
Whenever you would draw a card from the top of your deck, you may instead return Corinth's Refuse from your discard pile to your hand.
React: Before Corinth's Refuse dies: Target character suffers -2 Skill until end of turn.

name: Corten Lye
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Paladin
Characters adjacent to Corten gain +2 AC.
While Corten is in your discard pile, your Free Kingdoms gain +1 AC.
"While one of its members draws breath, the Order of Aroch. And while it exists, it fights for justice."

name: Coup de Grace
effect: Spend Order: Perform a melee strike that may only target a spent character. The strike inflicts an additional wound and the die roll is a Critical Success.
"No surprise that the elves first coined the term." - Logan Ebonwoulfe

name: Crush
effect: React: Before this fighter makes a melee strike roll: Gain +5 ATK for this strike. If the strike hits, immediately destroy one item equipped to the target (before wounds are inflicted).
"The Chosen build their walls no better than the elves!" - Kul of Clan Tergoth

name: Cry Havoc
effect: Spend Order: Target all opposing characters within one rank: Perform a melee strike against each target.
"Time to do my father proud. Kill them all." - King Alaric

name: Crystalline Gargoyle
effect:
Dwarf • Gargoyle
While Crystalline Gargoyle has one or more wounds, it has the ability, "Order: Spend a cleric within one rank: Remove one wound from Crystalline Gargolye and ready it."
"Fascinating" - Atiratu

name: Cunning Shot
effect: Order: Perform a +4 ranged strike that does not inflict wounds. If the strike hits, spend the target and move him forward one rank, if possible.
"Dragons do, after all, epitomise cunning." - Magellan

name: Cure Lethal Wounds
effect:
Water
Spend Order: Target a wounded character: Remove all wounds from the target.
Spend React: Before target character suffers wounds: Reduce the wounds to zero.
"Magic can aid the healing process, but it's no substitute for good medical knowledge." - Strak

name: Curse of Heartless Lies
effect: Spend Order: Perform a +7 ranged strike.
"The truth of it will simply kill you." - Skisk Foulfire

name: Dahlia Genecourt
effect:
Deverenian • Cantor • Unique
React: Once per turn, after target opposing character wounds a Deverenian you control: The target suffers a penalty to ATK, AC, and Skill equal to the wounded Deverenian's Level.

name: Dallen's Blood
effect:
Armor
React: After target character targets this cleric with a melee strike: The target must succeed with a fear save (DC 13 + number of characters in this rank) or the strike is a Critical Failure.
"The Stormlost's armor is as much a curse as a blessing."

name: Dame Martha
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Ranger
Martha has +5 AC against ranged strikes.
Spend Order: Perform two consecutive +3 ranged strikes.
"Why does everyone assume I'm a paladin?"

name: Darius
effect:
Deverenian / Blacksmith
Darius and adjacent Deverenians gain +1 Level for equipping Weapons.
"Find me a source of blackiron, and I can forge weapons worthy of our noble crusade."

name: Darkwood Staff
effect:
Weapon
Order: Spend Darkwood Staff: Shuffle a wizard spell from your discard pile into your deck.
Order: Once per turn, remove an item in your discard pile from the game: Ready Darkwood Staff.

name: Defiance
effect:
Dwarf / Exile
While spent, Defiance has -1 HP.
"It is not my place to strike down the loathsome ones. I must merely buy enough time for my comrades to move into position. I do not need to survive to know triumph."

name: Demand
effect:
Dwarf • Barbarian • POWERATTACK +3 / Exile
While performing a melee strike against a higher Level character, Demand gains POWERATTACK +5 (+8 total).
"Shut it."

name: Disabling Unit
effect:
Nothrog • Siege
Order: Once per turn: Perform a +6 ranged strike that may target a character within one rank and does not inflict wounds. If the strike hits, spend the target.
"Ekssellent idea, but will dat hold a deemon?" - Scyrax

name: Disintegrate
effect: Order: Target an unwounded character within two ranks: Succeed with a Skill check (DC = target's AC) to inflict one wound on the target or destroy an item equipped by the target.
"A bad spell. It leaves nothing to raise." - Jevae

name: Distrust
effect: Spend Order: Target a character of equal or lower Level whose alignment is different than his or her Warlord: Kill the target.
"If we can stir up unrest amongst the thralls, the masters will be easy pickings." - Logan

name: Divine Barrier
effect: React: After target character targets this cleric with a melee strike: Perform a melee strike against the target.
"I warned you. To strike me is to court your own damnation!" - Rockbender

name: Divine Guidance
effect: Order: Discard a card from your hand: Ready this cleric.
"Many call it a new path. I simply think of it as speeding progress along the old." - Kerebrus

name: Divining Cards
effect: Order: Spend Divining Cards: Look at the top two cards of any deck (top five if this cleric is a Seer), and put them all at the bottom or on top of the deck in the same order.
"What, no dice?" - Sipho Hamisi

name: Doombringer
effect: Order: Spend Doombringer: Perform a +2 ranged strike. This wizard may then perform a +2 ranged strike against a character that was adjacent to the first target.
"You were doomed the moment you stood against me." - Atiratu

name: Double Bladed Sword
effect:
Weapon • Shield
React: After this fighter performs a melee strike that hit, spend Double Bladed Sword: If the strike roll was 11 or better, this fighter performs a melee strike with an ATK equal to the previous strike.
Originally a weapon of the Havat-Iahn, only one fighter in the Accordlands can claim to master it.

name: Dragon Buckler
effect:
Weapon • Shield
This fighter inflicts an additional wound with melee strikes.
React: After this fighter performs a melee strike that hit, target up to two items equipped to the target of the strike that provide an AC bonus: Destroy the items.

name: Dragon's Lair
effect:
Mercenary • Siege • Dragon
May not perform actions other than the following:
React: Before a Dragon enters play, kill Dragon's Lair: The entering rank of the Dragon is reduced by one, if possible.

name: Dragonkin
effect:
Mercenary • Dragon
May not equip items.
React: Once per turn, before falling forward: Do not spend or stun before moving.
Spend Order: Perform a +3 ranged strike. Dragonkin may then perform a +3 ranged strike against a character that was adjacent to the first target.

name: Dreiga
effect:
Free Kingdoms
Characters adjacent to Dreiga gain +3 ATK.
While Dreiga is in your discard pile, your Free Kingdoms gain +1 ATK.
"The Chosen chain the soul as well as the body. Once more, we must become liberators."

name: Duanna
effect:
The Chosen • Thrall
You may have more than 3 copies of Duanna in your deck.
React: Before Duanna is killed: Shuffle her into your deck after she dies.
"If they saw us as tyrants, I'm sure they'd voice complaint." - Naram-Sin

name: Dueling Saber
effect:
Weapon
Order: Spend Dueling Saber, target a character within one rank: The target performs a melee strike against this fighter. Perform a melee strike against the target.
"There is no need for our followers to die for our causes. Merely face me in honorable combat to decide this battle." - Brymin

name: Dythanus' Essence
effect:
Epic
Lich only.
Order: Equip Dythanus' Essence to an adjacent character regardless of class, Level and Lich trait.
React: Before target Lich you control is killed, shuffle Dythanus' Essence into your deck: Spend the target if possible, remove any wounds, and move him adjacent to this character. The target is no longer killed. Kill this character.

name: Edge
effect:
Dwarf • Barbarian
While performing a melee strike against an evil character, Edge gains +5 ATK.
"Ye cannae make peace wi' monsters, no matter the mask they wear."

name: Enhe
effect:
The Chosen • Thrall
React: Before Enhe is killed with an action by a character you control: Target non-Thrall permanently gains +1 ATK and AC. Remove Enhe from the game after he dies.

name: Enkida
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Druid / Tribe of Ravens
May not equip a Steed.
Order: Once per turn: Move Enkida forward up to two ranks.
Order: Once per turn: Move Enkida backward one rank.
"It's as if she was born on this isle." - Angus Hammerfall

name: Fire at Will
effect:
Scouts gain +2 Levels for performing this action.
React: After you roll initiative, target a character within two ranks: Until end of turn, all non-spell ranged strikes against that character gain a bonus equal to this rogue's Level.
"I thought you'd never ask." - Shadith Glyn

name: Fireball
effect:
Fire
Spend Order: Target a character two ranks away, target any characters adjacent to the target: Perform a +4 ranged strike against the first target. After the ranged strike, all targets must succeed with a magic save (DC = this wizard's Skill) or suffer a wound.

name: Flame Arrows
effect:
Fire
Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike. This wizard may then perform a +2 ranged strike against a character that was adjacent to the first target.
"I could expound at length about my love of flame. But I think that I'll demonstrate it to thee." - Yavlo the Kindled

name: Flamespitter
effect:
Nothrog • Siege
May not attack or equip items.
Spend Order: Perform a +7 ranged strike. After the ranged strike resolves, perform consecutive +4 ranged strikes against any characters who were adjacent to the original target.
"Nuthin' like da smell of roast enemy in da morn'g." - Scyrax

name: Forest's Hunger
effect: Spend Order: Target a rank: Until end of turn, any character who moves into that rank must succeed with a Dexterity save (DC 5 + this cleric's Skill, DC 10 + this cleric's Skill if he is a Druid) or become spent. Spent characters who fail become stunned instead.

name: Freia
effect:
Elf
React: Before fixing an illegal second rank: If your Warlord is an Elf, put Freia into your first rank from your hand.
"You wouldn't believe what I found in the ocean."

name: Full Plate
effect: Armor
"How do humans put up with this bulk?" - Guardian

name: Galgalax
effect:
The Chosen • Daemon • Planar
May not start in play.
